title: (Definitely) The Best Dogs of All Time
description: Since the dawn of time, dogs have been the number one source of joy in this world. This is a book about the very best of them.Powerful dogs, mythical dogs, heroic dogs, talented dogs, literary dogs, dogs who have changed the course of history, and dogs who have set the internet ablaze.Dogs, dogs, dogs, dogs, dogs, dogs, dogs.From the deeply misunderstood Cerberus, the multi-headed hound of Hades, to Hachiko, Rin Tin Tin, and Dukeâ€”the thrice-elected mayor of Cormorant, Minnesota (who is an actual dog).With words by Jadan Carroll and illustrations by Molly Dyson, (Definitely) The Best Dogs of all Time tells heart-warming, absurd, and informative stories of the most exceptional hounds to have bounded across the earth, their majestic tongues flowing in the breeze, and of the humans who love them.
author: Jadan Carroll
